title: Dumbnote
author: Viriya Reungwai
excerpt: Lightning-fast Markdown note app — perfect for those surprise calls, impromptu meetings, or quick debriefs where every second counts. Open, type, and capture — before the moment passes. Your notes stay readable and editable anywhere, forever.
text: Lightning-fast Markdown note app — perfect for those surprise calls, impromptu meetings, or quick debriefs where every second counts. Open, type, and capture — before the moment passes. Your notes stay readable and editable anywhere, forever.
html: Lightning-fast Markdown note app — perfect for those surprise calls, impromptu meetings, or quick debriefs where every second counts. Open, type, and capture — before the moment passes. Your notes stay readable and editable anywhere, forever.
